fact-3.value: The  Group  provides  a  range  of  banking  and  other  financialservices. The business review on pages 3 to 9 contains a reviewof the results and operations of the Group, of most recent eventsand of likely future developments.In relation to the Group’s business, no contracts of significanceto the Group within the meaning of LR 6.1.77(10) of the EuronextDublin Listing Rules existed at any time during the year ended31 December 2021
